title: Marked
description: In the battlefield of spiritual warfare, Angels and Demons fight for the hearts and minds of all humanity. Hidden away from the eyes of everyday people, the spiritual realm goes undetected but for those who get a second chance. Jack Crowley, a dedicated atheist, suddenly finds himself witnessing the supernatural and is faced with difficult choices that will determine his eternity. Suspenseful, supernatural and thought provoking, Marked captures the essence of the spiritual battles that take place within every person.   A fictitious Christian story that parallels truths from the Bible, such as: salvation, grace and the spiritual battles that take place everyday.   CC Approved â€“ Clean Content Approved.
author: T.K. Chapin
